name: Jira Cloud Dark Flat
description:
Dark theme for Atlassian JIRA Cloud.
For JIRA Server, see Jira Dark Flat.
Based heavily on Jira Dark Flat by Benjamin Bagley.
additional_info:
June 11, 2018:
  • Fixed focused issue rows in search.
May 25, 2018:
  • Fixed styling of highlighted rows in the backlog.
March 16, 2018:
  • Fixed styling on issue groups in Kanban boards, and issue comments in the sidebar.
  • Tweaked styling of QR codes on issue pages.

discussions.name: doesn't work for me, but i'll try it again soon
The best dark them for Jira Cloud that I have found--and I have been through several.
